DOC.brief_summary: GW685698X novel glucocorticoid receptor agonist develop orally inhale treatment asthma . In previous study inhale GW685698X administer dry powder contain either lactose alone lactose cellobiose octaacetate . However , future dry powder GW685698X formulation contain lactose magnesium stearate . This study first administration new GW685698X dry powder formulation man provide safety tolerability data support development formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Repeat Dose GW685698X With Magnesium Stearate , Excipient Bridging Study , In Healthy Volunteers
